duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide polite, friendly greetings and interactions with all guests approaching the department.
Use selling skills to create a selling environment and prepare products for sale according to standards.
Assist in product receiving, inventory, and storage, as well as pricing, stocking, and rotating items in sales areas.
Maintain safety and sanitation standards in all relevant areas and ensure high quality and freshness of products.
Communicate guest requests/concerns and shrink issues to management, and make PA announcements for sale and promotional items.
Perform all other duties as assigned by management.
